title: Review Policy for Rating Errors
description: A customer believes their premium is too high and is asking for a review of their policy for any potential rating errors.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and retrieve all their policy details and rating information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the complete policy file.

tasks.description: Manually review all rating factors (e.g., address, vehicle use, driver assignments, discounts) for accuracy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the policy and finds that a multi-policy discount was not correctly applied.

tasks.description: Correct the error, recalculate the premium, and process a refund for the overpayment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent corrects the discount, resulting in a lower premium, and issues a refund to the customer.
